Description: Item is NEW and boxed - NOT a factory second or store return. We are an authorized distributor of McKlein products. Front zipper pocket. Front pocket for files. Back pocket for accessories. Main compartment features an interior zipper pocket and an interior organizer for pens, business cards and small devices. Secure, detachable patent-pending Fly-Through Checkpoint-Friendly laptop sleeve design. Detachable laptop sleeve can be used as a separate case. Laptop sleeve padded with high-density foam fits most laptops 15.6” in screen size. Includes Tablet Pocket. Leather shoulder straps. Orange, green, blue, and pink cases are trimmed in sand. Measures approximately: 17" x 5" x 12.75". Shoulder Strap: Double. Handle Drop Length Approximately: 12". McKlein recommends using LEXOL-pH as a non-alkaline cleanser and Lexol Leather Conditioner and Preservative to maintain the strength, beauty, utility and flexibility of McKlein leathers - old and new - and to restore resiliency. Limited Lifetime Warranty from McKleinUSA. Welcome to Toro Leather, your source for motorcycle apparel, helmets, luggage and accessories. We are dedicated to creating happy, satisfied customers and pride ourselves in our customer service. BID WITH CONFIDENCE.Item offered is guaranteed as described and pictured. Every effort is made to give accurate and meaningful descriptions. Inquiries are invited and encouraged. The Quality Assurance criteria we have, ensures that our customers receive the best possible product. Please CONTACT US with the item number prior to bidding if you have any questions. Payment: We accept Paypal, and all major credit cards. Shipping: We ship via USPS, UPS and FedEx. We may use an alternate shipping method than specified on occasion as needed. Any item shipped via UPS or FedEx must ship to a PHYSICAL STREET ADDRESS ONLY - NO P.O. BOXES. The shipping address must be the same address as provided with payment. Most items ship the same or next business day after receipt of payment but may on rare occasion take up to three business days. We do not ship on weekends or public holidays. Combined shipping: We are happy to combine shipping when possible by prior arrangement only, for items purchased and shipped together. Buyer must contact us before purchase to determine shipping rate. California addresses: All items shipped to California address are charged California sales tax. Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and APO/FPO: There is a shipping surcharge for all items shipped to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and to APO/FPO addresses. Please enter your shipping address ZIP code into the field provided in the 'Shipping and payments' tab before purchase for actual surcharge amount. International shipping: We ship to most international destinations. International purchases must be paid by Paypal only. We are NOT responsible for customs delays or customs charges. If an item is held in foreign customs, it is your responsibility to contact them for information. Please do not ask us for assistance with foreign customs procedures. We are always happy to ship via a quicker shipping method if you contact prior to purchase for a shipping quote. Returns: Items marked as 'Clearance' or 'Closeout' are non-returnable. To return or exchange an item you must contact us to request an RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) number within specified return time. ReturnPolicy.Description: Only items in new unused condition with all original tags will be accepted. · A Return Authorization (RA) number must be requested for any return. Toro Leather will not be responsible for any returns made without prior authorization, regardless of proof of delivery. Items returned without a valid RA number issued by us or otherwise not in accordance with our return policy will be refused or returned at buyer’s expense. When an item is returned without this authorization number, credit or replacement cannot be guaranteed. Returns are subject to a 20% restocking fee. · Any return must be postmarked within 30-days of receipt. Items postmarked after 30-days will not be accepted. · We are not responsible for any returning merchandise lost in transit. We therefore recommend that merchandise be fully insured with the carrier. · Refunds or exchanges will not be issued for returned items with signs of use, damage or missing tags and will be returned to sender at sender's cost. · Shipping is non-refundable. · Any item with free shipping will be refunded less our cost to ship it to you. Shipping will be charged for any exchange or non-deliverable item. · Any item marked as ‘CLEARANCE’ is strictly non-returnable. · Thank you in advance for your understanding and cooperation with our return policy. If any detail is not clear, please do not hesitate to contact us.
